text: I am running into an issue using @@ in a .properties file. The variable is a database password (I also tried using it in the username and still didn't work), and fails our build since Ant is unable to connect to the database. However, when I enter @@@ in the .properties file, and leave the DB user's password with @@ in it then everything works.
